subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sam Hornish Jr., the fastest driver at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway for most of the month, did not disappoint Saturday, driving away with the pole position for the May 28 Indianapolis 500.
snippet: Sam Hornish Jr., the fastest driver at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway for most of the month, did not disappoint Saturday, driving away with the pole position for the May 28 Indianapolis 500.
